bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition Combined Designation of five types of nüe ji 瘧疾 , malaria ailment. A concrete identification of what these five types were meant to be has not been recorded in known medical literature. Zheng lei ben cao 證類本草 Substance Entry tian shu shi 天鼠屎 quotes JYJZ : 治五瘧方 , “Recipe to cure five types of malaria ”. Wu pi 無皮 , absence of skin [5]

Pathological Condition of children with their body having no skin and assuming a faint red complexion. XEWSZWLF 1: 兒生，身如凝血，若無皮者，死 , “When a child is born with its body appearing like coagulated blood, and if it has no skin , it will die”.
